content: Does anyone know if the Furore Spark server has a branch for STU3 yet? I am looking through their branches, and not seeing anything specific to STU3. But I also see some changes in other branches that are within the last few days. Maybe STU3 is getting lumped into a branch labeled the wrong FHRI version number?
Hi @Sean McIlvenna our FHIR tool stack (Forge, Simplifier and Spark) is still at DSTU2. We will update our tools to STU3 after the final ballot.
